title: T206 Bernhard Southern League *Moved to Ebay*

posts.post_title: T206 Bernhard Southern League *Moved to Ebay*
posts.post_content:
Moved to eBay
Bernhard PSA 2 - [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/221530887325[/url]

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/T206-Bernhard-Piedmont-350-PSA-2-Good-new.jpg[/IMG]

SOLD
Lentz SGC 40 - *SOLD*
Orth SGC 30 - *SOLD*
Reagan PSA 2.5 - *SOLD*
Cranston SGC 20 - *SOLD
Howard SGC 10 - *SOLD*

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Harry-Lentz-Southern-League-Piedmont-350-SGC-40-small-sold.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Orth-Piedmont-350-Southern-League-SGC-30-sold.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Reagan-Piedmont-350-Southern-League-PSA-2-5-sold.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Bill-Cranston-Piedmont-350-SGC-20-SL-sold.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/t206-Ernie-Howard-Piedmont-350-SGC-10-sold.jpg[/IMG]

Reagan sold!

5 remain. Don't be shy!
All remaining cards have been reduced!
Additional price reductions. These beauties are needing a new home.

PM sent regarding Cranston and Howard.

Matt

Bernhard is still available. All others sold.

Some have asked whether or not the scratches on Bernhard is on the case or the card. They are on the card, which is the main reason for the grade. Very bold colors.
